companies.name: Cloover
companies.reason: Cloover is among the top pre-seed funded startups in October 2023, focusing on innovative AI solutions. Their recent funding has positioned them as a notable player in the startup ecosystem.

companies.name: Cleanlab
companies.reason: Cleanlab, which focuses on automated data curation and organization, raised $25 million in October 2023. This funding highlights their innovative approach to utilizing AI in data management.

companies.name: Pivot
companies.reason: Like Cloover, Pivot is recognized as one of the top pre-seed funded startups this October, with an innovative focus on AI applications, driving discussions in the tech community.
